characterabilities.name: Alternative History
characterabilities.description: This model is not allowed in competitive play events.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Disjunction
characterabilities.description: When an enemy model casts a spell while in this model's CMD range, double the COST of the spell. Additionally, enemy models must pay double to upkeep spells on models/units in this model's CMD range.

characterabilities.name: Cull Soul
characterabilities.description: This model gains soul tokens from living enemy models that are destroyed within 2" of this model. After this model replenishes focus during your next Control Phase, replace each soul token with 1 focus/fury/essence point.

characterabilities.name: Death Magic
characterabilities.description: During its activation, this model can remove friendly Grunt models in its unit from play to make additional melee attacks or to boost accuracy or damage rolls. It can make one additional melee attack or boost one roll for each model removed. When this model would suffer damage, you can choose one or more models in its unit that are in formation to suffer any number of those damage points instead, divided as you choose. If you do, this model does not suffer that damage. A model cannot suffer more damage as a result of Death Magic than it has unmarked damage boxes.

characterabilities.name: Elite Cadre [Undead] [Shield Guard]
characterabilities.description: Friendly Undead models gain Shield Guard. (When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have the model with Shield Guard directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.)

characterabilities.name: Flank [Undead]
characterabilities.description: When this model makes a melee attack against an enemy model in the melee range of a friendly Undead model, this model gains +2 to attack rolls and gains an additional damage die.

characterabilities.name: Morrdhic Ward
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by enemy spells.

characterabilities.name: Passive Necromancy
characterabilities.description: Once per turn when another living warrior model in this model's CMD range is destroyed by an enemy attack, you can choose to remove the boxed model from play and replace it with a Thrall Warrior model. The Thrall Warrior must forfeit it's combat action the turn it is put into play.

characterabilities.name: Range Amplifier
characterabilities.description: When this model casts a spell and is the point of origin for the spell, the spell gains +5 RNG.

characterabilities.name: Soul Taker [Unlimited Tokens]
characterabilities.description: This model can gain soul tokens. There is no limit to how many soul tokens it can carry.

characterabilities.name: Unholy Desecration
characterabilities.description: When a living model is destroyed in this model's CMD range, this model gains the destroyed model's corpse token. At the end of your next Control Phase, remove all corpse tokens from this model and add to play one Thrall Warrior Solo model for each 3 corpse token's removed within 3" of this model. The Thrall Warrior must forfeit it's Combat action the turn it is put into play.

feat.name: Unholy Communion
feat.description: Choose 9 enemy non-Leader warrior models currently in Alexia's Control range. Living models chosen suffer a boostable POW 12 corrosion damage roll. Take Control of undead models chosen, which become friendly independent models and can activate normally this turn. Unholy Communion lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Mistress of the Witchfire Blade -"Now I call my army of the dead, the Cauldron Born, arise, my messengers of death, our time has arrived."

ability.name: Death Toll [small or medium-based]
ability.description: When this weapon boxes a living enemy warrior model during this model's combat action, remove that model from play and add one Grunt to a friendly small or medium-based unit in this model's CMD range. Place the grunt in formation and in this model's CMD range. The Grunt must forfeit it's combat Action the turn it was put into play.

ability.name: Devour Essence
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon loses all essence points and soul tokens.

ability.name: Energy Siphon
ability.description: When this attack hits an enemy model with 1 or more focus, fury, or essence points on it, that model loses 1 focus, fury or essence point and this model gains 1 focus or fury point.

ability.name: Life Drinker
ability.description: When an attack with this weapon destroys a living enemy model, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can remove d3 damage points.

spells.name: Banishing Ward
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on target friendly model/unit expire. Affected models cannot be targeted by enemy spells or animi.

spells.name: Bleed
spells.description: When Bleed damages a living enemy model, this model can remove d3 damage points.

spells.name: Hollow
spells.description: Target friendly Faction unit gains +2 ARM, Undead and Soul Vessel. Once per turn when an affected model is disabled by an enemy attack, replace it with a friendly Void Spirit model. A model replaced by hollow is destroyed. The spellcaster gains its soul token regardless of the proximity of other models. (A model with soul Vessel generates soul tokens as if it were a living model.).

spells.name: Obliteration
spells.description: The force of this attack blasts apart the earth itself. All models hit suffer an unboostable POW 15 Arcane damage roll.

spells.name: Vision
spells.description: When target friendly Faction model is directly hit by an attack, you can choose to have it suffer no damage roll from the attack, then Vision expires.

characterabilities.name: Blood-Quenched
characterabilities.description: This model gains a cumulative +1 ARM and +1 to its melee damage rolls for each enemy model it destroys with a melee attack during its activation. This bonus lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Shield Guard]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Shield Guard. (When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have the model with Shield Guard directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.)

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Broken Pact]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Broken Pact armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Sidestep
characterabilities.description: When this model hits an enemy model with an initial melee attack or a melee special attack, it can advance up to 2" after the attack is resolved.

characterabilities.name: Warlock Adept [Skorne]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Skorne non-character Warbeasts in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warbeast, they may add it to their battlegroup.

feat.name: Defiance of the Void
feat.description: While in Makeda's Control range, friendly living models gain Retaliatory Strike. Additionally, when a friendly living warrior model in this model's Control range is disabled, this model can suffer 1 damage point to remove 1 damage point from the disabled model. This damage cannot be transferred. Defiance of the Void lasts for one round. (If a model with Retaliatory Strike is hit by an enemy melee attack during your opponent's turn, after that attack is resolved it can immediately make one basic melee attack against the attacking model. A model with Retaliatory Strike can make only one Retaliatory Strike per turn.)

execution.name: Primal Rage
execution.description: Once per turn, when this model suffers damage from an enemy attack at any time except while it is advancing, after the attack is resolved it can immediately make a full advance toward the attacking model and can make one basic melee attack.

spells.name: Carnage
spells.description: Friendly Faction models gain +2 to melee attack rolls against enemy models in the spellcaster's Control Range. Carnage lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Jackhammer
spells.description: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup immediately makes one basic melee attack.

spells.name: Quicken
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 SPD and DEF against ranged and magic attack rolls.

spells.name: The Lash
spells.description: If The Lash hits an enemy model, immediately after the attack is resolved this model or a friendly Faction model within 3" of it can advance up to 2". A model can advance only once per turn as a result of The Lash.

characterabilities.name: Alpha Hunter
characterabilities.description: Warbeasts in this model's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range can run, charge, or make power attacks without being forced. When this model destroys one or more enemy modes during its activation, warbeasts in its battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range gain +2 SPD and MAT for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Maltreatment
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, anytime during your activation phase except while activating another model, this model can remove 1 fury point from a warbeast in its battlegroup that is in its Control Range and add 1 fury point to it's own current total. The warbeast suffers d3 damage points.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [5"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 5", then it's activation ends.

feat.name: Whispers of Torment

execution.name: Furious Lashing

spells.name: Mortality

spells.description: Each model in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range can immediately remove d3+1 damage points. This spell can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Pursuit

characterabilities.name: Acrobatics
characterabilities.description: This model can advance through other models if it has enough movement to move completely past their bases. This model ignores intervening models when declaring its charge target.

characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy multi-boxed models with a melee attack during its unit's activation, other friendly faction warrior models gain +2 to their melee attack damage rolls while in this model's CMD range. Blade of the Empire lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it destroyed or removed from play one or more enemy models with melee attacks, this model can immediately make a full advance, then it's activation ends.

(When a model with Overtake destroys one or more enemy models with a basic melee attack during its Combat Action, after the attack is resolved it can immediately advance up to 1".)

execution.name: Leadership [Paingiver Bloodrunners] [Eye-Thief]

(A model suffering Blind cannot make range or magic attacks, suffers -4 MAT and DEF, and cannot run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks. It must forfeit either its Normal Movement or Combat Action during its next activation. Blind can be shaken.))

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Blindwater Congregation, Cephalyx, Circle Orboros, Convergence of Cyriss, Crucible Guard, Cryx, Cygnar, Grymkin, Infernals, Ios, Khador, Khymaera, Legion of Everblight, Llael, Ord, Orgoth, Protectorate of Menoth, Religion of the Twins, Searforge Commission, Skorne, Supernal Coalition, Talion Charter, Thornfall Alliance, Trollbloods]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Blindwater Congregation, Cephalyx, Circle Orboros, Convergence of Cyriss, Crucible Guard, Cryx, Cygnar, Grymkin, Infernals, Ios, Khador, Khymaera, Legion of Everblight, Llael, Ord, Orgoth, Protectorate of Menoth, Religion of the Twins, Searforge Commission, Skorne, Supernal Coalition, Talion Charter, Thornfall Alliance, Trollbloods.

characterabilities.name: Propelled [12]
characterabilities.description: This model cannot run, aim, charge, or become knocked down. This model can advance up to 12” total during its Normal Movement. If this model advances less than 12” during its Normal Movement, it can advance its remaining movement at the end of its activation.

characterabilities.name: Shooting Gallery
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 to Ranged accuracy rolls against models within 5” of it.

characterabilities.name: Sky Ladder
characterabilities.description: When this model ends it's Normal Movement, choose one small or medium-based friendly solo model within 2” of it. You can place the chosen model completely within 2” of its current location. A model can be placed as a result of Sky Ladder only once per turn.

ability.name: Critical Knockdown
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down.

ability.name: Crater
ability.description: On a direct hit, models hit suffer -2 SPD for one round.

ability.name: Critical Devastation
ability.description: On a critical hit, models hit are thrown d6" directly away from the attacker. Roll distance once for all models affected. Move models farthest from the attacker first. Instead of suffering blast damage, models hit but not directly hit suffer a damage roll with POW of collateral damage is equal to the blast damage POW of this weapon.

ability.name: Siege Weapon
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models and structures.

ability.name: Sky-Dropped
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon ignore cover. Models with Flight do not suffer blast damage from this attack.

characterabilities.name: Bottom Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The lower level of this structure is considered to be concealing terrain.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed or removed from play, all models inside of it immediately suffer 10 damage. This damage is simultaneous and not considered to have resulted from an attack. Replace this model with all surviving models that were inside of it when it was destroyed.

characterabilities.name: Forward Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be deployed up to 8” beyond your deployment zone.

characterabilities.name: Habitable [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Small and medium-based units and solos can enter this structure through a door on the lower level. A model/unit ending its Normal Movement within 1” of the door can choose to enter this building. Models entering this building can be placed on either the lower or upper levels. Models in a unit occupying this structure can be placed on either floor or both. There can be up to six small-based models or three medium-based models on each floor. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [any army]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for any army.

characterabilities.name: Movement Inside [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Models/units can use their Normal Movement to be placed on the top floor if they were previously on the lower floor or to be placed on the lower floor if they were on the top floor. Units using their Normal Movement to be placed are considered to have moved. Models cannot otherwise move, warp, or be placed while inside the building.

characterabilities.name: Top Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The upper level of this structure is considered to be elevated terrain. Additionally, models on the Top Floor gain Snipe. Spells cast from the Top Floor gain +4 RNG.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed or removed from play, all models inside of it immediately suffer 10 damage. This damage is simultaneous and not considered to have resulted from an attack. Replace this model with all surviving models that were inside of it when it was destroyed.

characterabilities.name: Forward Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be deployed up to 8” beyond your deployment zone.

A model/unit ending its Normal Movement within 1” of the door can choose to enter this building. Models entering this building can be placed on either the lower or upper levels. Models in a unit occupying this structure can be placed on either floor or both. There can be up to six small-based models or three medium-based models on each floor. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.

characterabilities.description: The lower level of this structure is considered to be concealing terrain.
